languages.text: "Кей-морагх, примадонна, осколки камня покоятся в груди каждого мон-кай, связанного с тобой узами крови. Как ты планируешь их вернуть?"

traits.locale_text: "Каэ-мораг, примадонна, осколки камня покоятся в груди каждого мон-кай, связанного с тобой узами крови. Как ты планируешь их вернуть?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Kae-morag, my leading lady, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"
languages.original_text: "Кей-морагх, примадонна, осколки камня покоятся в груди каждого мон-кай, связанного с тобой узами крови. Как ты планируешь их вернуть?"

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, my star. The shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. By what means do you intend to return them?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, my star. The shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. By what means do you intend to return them?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, my star, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, my star, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, my leading lady, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, my leading lady, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「カエ＝モラグ。主演女優さん、モノリスのかけらは君の血族全モン＝ケイの胸に埋め込まれてるんだよ。一体全体、どうやって戻すつもりなんだい？」
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, my leading lady, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"

traits.locale_text: 「カエ＝モラグ。主演女優さん、モノリスのかけらは君の血族全モン＝ケイの胸に埋め込まれてるんだよ。一体全体、どうやって戻すつもりなんだい？」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “该死，我的女主角。每个与你血脉相连的猴子，他们胸前都埋着灵魂石的碎片。你究竟打算如何归还这些碎片呢？”
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, my leading lady, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"

traits.locale_text: “我的星辰，每个与你血脉相连的猴子，他们胸前都埋着灵魂石的碎片。你究竟打算如何归还这些碎片呢？”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Kae-morag, mon étoile, les fragments du Monolithe sont incrustés dans chacun des mon-keigh de votre famille. Comment comptez-vous nous les rendre ? »
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, my leading lady, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"

traits.locale_text: « Kae-morag, mon étoile, les fragments du Monolithe sont incrustés dans chacun des mon-keigh de votre famille. Comment comptez-vous nous les rendre ? »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Kae-morag, mi líder, los fragmentos del Monolito están enterrados en el pecho de todos los mon-keigh que comparten tu misma sangre. ¿Cómo pretendes devolvérnoslos?».
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, my leading lady, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"

traits.locale_text: «Kae-morag, estrella mía, los fragmentos del Monolito están enterrados en el pecho de todos los mon-keigh que comparten tu misma sangre. ¿Cómo pretendes devolvérnoslos?».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Kae-morag, meine Hauptdarstellerin, die Splitter des Monoliths stecken in der Brust aller Chem-Pan-Sey, die durch Blutsbande mit Euch verbunden sind. Wie genau gedenkt Ihr, sie zurückzugeben?"
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, my leading lady, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag, mein Star, die Splitter des Monoliths stecken in der Brust aller Chem-Pan-Sey, die durch Blutsbande mit Euch verbunden sind. Wie genau gedenkt Ihr, sie zurückzugeben?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Sevgili baş aktris, kae-morag. Monolit'in parçaları, kan bağın olan herkesin içinde yatıyor. O parçaları nasıl geri vermeyi planlıyorsun acaba?"
languages.original_text: "Kae-morag, my leading lady, the shards of the Monolith are lodged inside the chest of every mon-keigh bound to you by ties of blood. How exactly do you intend to return them?"

traits.locale_text: "Kae-morag sevgili baş aktrist; Monolit'in parçaları, kan bağıyla sana bağlı olan herkesin içinde yatıyor. O parçaları nasıl iade etmeyi planlıyorsun acaba?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
